title: Release Taliyah.
body:
I'm so excited for her that I actually want to play the game.

Aurelion Sol was a failure of a champ.

replies.body: Excuse you, Aurelion sol is amazing.
Sol wasn't a failure? he's an awesome champ, its just that most people cant be bothered to put in some effort into playing him properly.
She will be out next patch.

Jhin is epic, played him once or twice, while different is still fairly easy to learn.  Aurelion is too hard to learn for too little results. His passive and ult are only uses. If one is to get close Aurelian is dead, no escape for him. This is not a mage thing, most mages can still screw you when you get nice and tight. 

I am definitely excited about Taliyah, but it takes so long that I am slightly ticked.
Loved Aurelion, already love Taliyah. Riot has really done a good job with these recent champions!

Sol was amazing and so was jhin... Just because people suck at both of them doesn't mean they're bad... Taliyah is the first new champ release that I haven't actually been interested in tbh. She looks boring and weak. Her concept is cool though :/
Sol was a failure, and it's the same with every other champ release, will be out the following patch
